This yukata is really beautiful. No tears in the fabric, perfect to wear in the summer. As I am 5'6, 130lbs, with broad shoulders, I went with the one size. I got this because I'm going to a Tanabata event and they are encouraging guests to wear yukata's/kimonos.  Reason why I'm giving it 4 out of 5 is because, when I first opened the package I saw this big bag with a clip of little pearls. At first I thought it was part of decoration so I put it off to the side. Inspected everything to make sure all was received. The pearls was made me confused. I looked at the picture and its part of the hair chopstick piece 😂. So everything was received minus the hairpiece. I'm glad I ordered some hairpieces on the side.
